site.title: Web Util.IO - Fast & Secure Online Tools
site.plainTitle: Web Util.IO - Fast & Secure Online Tools
site.description: Your collection of web utilities that run directly in your browser. Fast, secure, and private.

remover-fundo.title: Background Remover
remover-fundo.description: Remove the background from images with a single click, using AI.

descompactar-arquivo.title: File Decompressor
descompactar-arquivo.description: Extract files from a .zip archive directly in the browser.

comprimir-imagem.title: Image Compressor
comprimir-imagem.description: Reduce the size of your images without losing quality.

criptografar-arquivo.title: File Encryptor
criptografar-arquivo.description: Encrypt and decrypt files using the AES algorithm.

gerador-hash.title: Hash Generator
gerador-hash.description: Generate SHA-256 hashes for any text or file.

comprimir-arquivo.title: File Compressor
comprimir-arquivo.description: Create ZIP archives from multiple files easily.

contador-palavras.title: Word Counter
contador-palavras.description: Count words, characters, sentences, and paragraphs in a text.

conversor-arquivos.title: File Converter
conversor-arquivos.description: Convert files from one format to another. Starting with images.

redimensionar-imagem.title: Image Resizer
redimensionar-imagem.description: Change the dimensions (width and height) of an image.

fileCompressor.errorNoFiles: Please select at least one file to compress.
fileCompressor.errorCompressing: An error occurred while compressing the files:

imageCompressor.errorInvalidFile: Please select a valid image file (JPEG, PNG, WEBP).
imageCompressor.dragAndDrop: Drag and drop an image here

fileConverter.errorInvalidFile: Please select a valid file (image, PDF, JSON, CSV).
fileConverter.errorInvalidJson: Invalid or empty JSON. Ensure it's an array of objects.
fileConverter.errorInvalidCsv: Invalid or empty CSV. Ensure it has headers and data.

fileEncryptor.errorFillFile: Please select a file and enter the password.
fileEncryptor.errorFillEncryptedFile: Please select an encrypted file and enter the password.
fileEncryptor.errorDecrypt: Error decrypting. Check the password or the encrypted file.
fileEncryptor.errorCryptoNotAvailable: Cryptography features are not available in this browser or context. Please ensure you are using a modern browser over HTTPS.
fileEncryptor.dragAndDrop: Drag and drop a file here

hashGenerator.placeholder: Enter text to generate SHA-256 hash...
hashGenerator.errorCryptoNotAvailable: Cryptography features are not available in this browser or context. Please ensure you are using a modern browser over HTTPS.

backgroundRemover.errorProcessing: Error: Image processing did not return a valid result.
backgroundRemover.dragAndDrop: Drag and drop an image here
backgroundRemover.errorInvalidFile: Please select a valid image file.

fileDecompressor.errorInvalidArchive: Please select a valid .zip or .tar file.
fileDecompressor.errorReadingArchive: An error occurred while reading the file. It may be corrupted or not a supported format.
fileDecompressor.dragAndDrop: Drag and drop a .zip or .tar file here

imageResizer.dragAndDrop: Drag and drop an image here
imageResizer.errorInvalidFile: Please select a valid image file.
imageResizer.errorDimensions: Please enter valid width and height.
